learning_outcomes: Identify clothing store personnel and facilities
Ask for specific clothing sizes (S, M, L, XL)
Use 'Can I...?' for requests and permissions in a store

content.prompt_es: Une los términos de la tienda:

content.text: Can I help you? Yes, I am looking for a large t-shirt.

content.prompt_es: Si la ropa es muy barata, dices que está en:
'I'll take it' significa que vas a comprar el artículo.

content.stimulus_en: Can I ________ this on? Yes, the ________ room is over there.

content.prompt_es: Pregunta si tienen una talla grande (L):
content.stimulus_es: Do you have a large size?
content.correct_answer: Do you have a large size
